user_story.i_want: create a resolution of the board
user_story.so_that: initiate a decision of the Board

whens_list: I go to the Board page
I press "Create a new Board Resolution"
I enter the text of the new resolution
I choose to open the resolution for electronic voting
thens_list: I should be on the Board page
I should see the new resolution in the list of currently-open resolutions
the new resolution should have voting buttons

whens_list: I go to the Board page
I press "Create a new Board Resolution"
I enter the text of the new resolution
I choose to save the resolution for consideration at a future meeting of the board
thens_list: I should be on the Board page
I should see the new resolution in the list of draft resolutions
